fields.title: LEGACY LEATHER JACKET

fields.content:
CREATING A NEW HERITAGE

Buffalo Jackson is a leather goods and apparel brand with a love for adventure and a dedication to choosing a simpler way of living.

BORN IN THE WEST. RAISED IN THE SOUTH

Buffalo Jackson Trading Company is the story of the Rugged Gentleman™, a flesh and blood character defined by the values of grit, honesty, pride, and character.

fields.author: fd87fc29-61cd-40c2-a5d0-f1b54d2ff06a

fields.title: INFERNO BROWN LEATHER JACKET
fields.summary: A comprehensive guide to cleaning and maintaining your leather items
fields.content:
FINEST RAW MATERIALS

It all starts with the raw materials and since we carry our life in our jackets, we don’t use anything but only the best possible materials. All our jackets are made with full grain natural leather, YKK Zippers, and polyester lining.

 

EXQUISITE CRAFTSMANSHIP

Our products are handmade, one at a time by one craftsman with precision and attention to detail, unlike the mass chain production. Not opting for chain production means higher cost but a better quality that you will notice in our stitching.

 

FAIR PRICING - DIRECT TO YOU

With our direct-to-consumer approach, our products come at ¼ the price of what luxury brands would sell them for. We keep our prices lower by cutting out middlemen, storefront costs and inefficient marketing spent. Additionally, with just-in-time production.

SIZES THAT FIT ALL

Inclusivity is a buzzword but we take it quite seriously. We truly know there is something electrifying about wearing a great leather jacket, we ensure no one misses out on this. All our jackets are offered in eight standard sizes from XS to 4XL and made-to-measure-option.

DISCOVERY & EXPRESSION

As no two persons are alike, we believe in discovery and expression. Our customers can make 100% custom, bespoke jackets from scratch with the help of our design consultants. Thus, fostering diversity and enabling our customers to fully express themselves and be apart from the rest.

 

#THEJACKETMAKER CUSTOMERS GALLERY

Tag #thejacketmaker or upload your photos to be featured in our gallery.

fields.title: JACKSON SHEARLING LEATHER JACKET
fields.summary: You don’t wear the Jackson men’s shearling leather vest to blend in—you wear it because it works. It carries the weight of the West in its shoulders: genuine, high-end Turkish shearling wool, set in a sharp cowboy yoke of lighter brown riding over deep, dark sheepskin leather. Built for warmth and freedom of movement,
fields.content:
• You don’t wear the Jackson men’s shearling leather vest to blend in—you wear it because it works. It carries the weight of the West in its shoulders: genuine, high-end Turkish shearling wool, set in a sharp cowboy yoke of lighter brown riding over deep, dark sheepskin leather. Built for warmth and freedom of movement, it’s as at home on the ranch as it is behind the wheel or stepping into town.

    Made in Turkey from the finest sheepskin, it holds heat when the wind cuts and breathes easy when the day warms. The genuine shearling is thick and honest—no shortcuts, no synthetics—just the real thing, built to outlast whatever’s ahead. Two front pockets keep cold hands warm and essentials close, while the two-tone contrast gives it an unmistakable silhouette—rooted in ranch tradition, refined for a man who knows his style.

    The front closure features a full antique brass YKK zipper paired with a snap button placket, sealing in warmth and adding an extra layer of protection against the wind. With stitching meant to see decades, the Jackson isn’t just another vest—it’s a trusted layer, a companion, and the kind of gear you pass down with the stories still in it.
     

  • CREATING A NEW HERITAGE

  • Buffalo Jackson is a leather goods and apparel brand with a love for adventure and a dedication to choosing a simpler way of living.

fields.title: iPhone 17 pro max
fields.content:
Price & Availability in Pakistan

The all-new iPhone 17 Pro Max is available in the UAE, starting from AED 5,099.

iPhone 17 Pro Max - iSTYLE UAE

Yes, the iPhone 17 series has been launched in Pakistan and is available through official distributors like Mercantile and Jazz, as well as official retail partners. The phones are PTA-approved and come with official warranties. 

 

  • Availability:

    The iPhone 17, 17 Pro, 17 Pro Max, and iPhone Air are all available for purchase. 

     

  • Purchase points:

    You can buy them from official Apple distributors, authorized resellers, and telecom operators like Jazz. Jazz and Apple Pakistan are highlighted as key vendors. 

     

  • PTA Approval:

    All officially sold devices come with PTA approval, ensuring they can be used with local SIM cards without issues. 

     

  • Warranty:

    Purchases are backed by an official Apple warranty and support, often with added value like the Mercantile Extended Warranty.
